description: Wanted to get my hair colored and called for salon at home service as getting hair color at a parlor is very boring and time taking. The service was excellent and my hair look awesome now.
I got nourishment hair spa that they provide and it was wonderful. Their professionals are well trained and provided ver nice experience.

I hired a professional from lookplex for full body massage as I was never comfortable in getting done it in any parlor. She was very friendly and well trained. Would surely recommend lookplex to everyone.
